name: UCB-J consortium
description: Collection of PET data using the 11C-UCB-J tracer for imaging the synaptic vesicle glycoprotein 2A

license.name: Data User Agreement - restricted access until 2027

Information: To access those UCB-J data, you must be a partner in the consortium.
